search.query: eventtype=mir sourcetype="w32tasks" $wild$ | table TaskItem.Name, TaskItem.VirtualPath, TaskItem.Creator, TaskItem.AccountName, TaskItem.MostRecentRunTime, TaskItem.ActionList.Action.ActionType, TaskItem.ActionList.Action.ExecProgramMd5sum, TaskItem.ActionList.Action.ExecProgramPath, TaskItem.ActionList.Action.ExecArguments, TaskItem.Comment
